name: dcos-aws-cli
description: The DC/OS AWS CLI simplifies some operations for cluster running on AWS. At this point, it only supports one command - listing public IPs. See documentation: https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/dcos-aws-cli/1.9
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in preview. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. Preview packages should never be used in production!
